info.description: The Azure SQL Database management API provides a RESTful set of web APIs that interact with Azure SQL Database services to manage your databases. The API enables users to create, retrieve, update, and delete databases, servers, and other entities.

put.description: Creates or updates a threat detection policy.

ApiVersionParameter.description: The API version to use for the request.
ApiVersionParameter.name: api-version

BlobAuditingPolicyNameParameter.description: The name of the blob auditing policy.
BlobAuditingPolicyNameParameter.name: blobAuditingPolicyName

ManagedInstanceNameParameter.description: The name of the managed instance.
ManagedInstanceNameParameter.name: managedInstanceName

ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group that contains the resource. You can obtain this value from the Azure Resource Manager API or the portal.
ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName

SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The subscription ID that identifies an Azure subscription.
SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId

VirtualClusterNameParameter.description: The name of the virtual cluster.
VirtualClusterNameParameter.name: virtualClusterName

LogicalServerSecurityAlertPolicyListResu.description: A list of the server's security alert policies.

nextLink.description: Link to retrieve next page of results.

SecurityAlertPolicyProperties.description: Properties of a security alert policy.

creationTime.description: Specifies the UTC creation time of the policy.

disabledAlerts.description: Specifies an array of alerts that are disabled. Allowed values are: Sql_Injection, Sql_Injection_Vulnerability, Access_Anomaly, Data_Exfiltration, Unsafe_Action

emailAccountAdmins.description: Specifies that the alert is sent to the account administrators.

emailAddresses.description: Specifies an array of e-mail addresses to which the alert is sent.

retentionDays.description: Specifies the number of days to keep in the Threat Detection audit logs.

state.description: Specifies the state of the policy, whether it is enabled or disabled or a policy has not been applied yet on the specific database.

storageAccountAccessKey.description: Specifies the identifier key of the Threat Detection audit storage account.

storageEndpoint.description: Specifies the blob storage endpoint (e.g. https://MyAccount.blob.core.windows.net). This blob storage will hold all Threat Detection audit logs.
